body: Nardack:  uh...yea...it was...chances are, if you actually did collect/live through that time, you only saw the stuff you preferred.  It's been prolific since the 70s.

This is a master piece, I was searching for this like 3 months.
The wonderful artwork and the incredible blend of colors make me love this doujinshi.
Sadly RA doesn't have much material to appreciate.

Page 12. 
My new playmat for MTG.

Art is wonderful! Loli...Not so much. People will rip into me for saying this but I hate how mainstream loli stuff is in the modern eromanga/doujin world. It wasn't this way back in 80/90's, and it's disheartening.
if you dislike the censorship that much, over at chan.sankakucomplex they have these without censoring and more of this artist tagged with "alphonse_(white_datura)"

Drawn by a God.

ra is a God.

this is not art
art don't have censorship
and it's too real instead of loli i see child and my chin chin say no
